H0.text: What is removed from natural yogurt to produce Greek yogurt (also called labneh [Arabic] and strained yogurt). Excess Liquid

H1.text: What is removed from natural yogurt to produce Greek yogurt (also called labneh [Arabic] and strained yogurt). Bacteria

H2.text: What is removed from natural yogurt to produce Greek yogurt (also called labneh [Arabic] and strained yogurt). Lactose

H3.text: What is removed from natural yogurt to produce Greek yogurt (also called labneh [Arabic] and strained yogurt). Whey

A4.text: the yogurt may be centrifuged or membrane-filtered to remove whey

A5.text: the liquid resulting from straining yogurt is called 'acid whey' and is composed of water, yogurt cultures, protein, a slight amount of lactose, and lactic acid
